hero.title: Fullstack Developer
hero.description: With a degree in Computer Science, hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress, and a multidisciplinary background in educational and tech projects, I'm ready to help bring your digital project to life.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Fullstack Developer & Tech Educator
about.description: I'm a fullstack developer with a background in Computer Science and practical experience building websites and web applications. I've worked with WordPress, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I've also led educational projects focused on digital innovation. I’m passionate about combining technology, design, and education to create solutions that truly make a difference in people’s lives.

santaMaria.description: Supported teachers in implementing digital activities for 200+ students using educational technology tools. Organized project evidence and reports for institutional audits, ensuring compliance with pedagogical guidelines.

jaAmapa.description: Managed educational programs in 12 public schools, impacting 500+ students. Facilitated partnerships with 30+ volunteers and institutions, increasing engagement by 40%. Conducted trainings on tools like Google Classroom and Canva.

firerocket.description: Developed custom themes with HTML/CSS, reducing load time by 25%. Implemented security and performance plugins to ensure platform stability.

reactNews.name: React News
reactNews.description: PWA that consumes a public API to show top daily news. A modern project using ReactJS and integration with external services.

springBoot.name: Spring boot API
springBoot.description: Simple product API built with Java and Spring Boot. Demonstrates backend skills and RESTful service structure.

nodeApi.name: NodeJs API
nodeApi.description: Node.js API with full CRUD for patients. A fullstack project showing backend integration with Express and organized routes.

frontend.title: Modern Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive, accessible, and performant interfaces using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

apiIntegration.title: API and Backend Integration
apiIntegration.description: Consuming and integrating REST APIs using Axios, Fetch, or modern libraries. Efficient communication with backends in Node.js and Java (Spring Boot).

fullstack.title: Fullstack Web Development
fullstack.description: Building complete web applications with React frontend and Node.js or Spring Boot backend, following best practices and clean code structure.

components.title: Componentization and Code Reuse
components.description: Creating reusable and scalable components with React and Styled Components, maintaining organization and productivity in large projects.

performance.title: Performance and SEO Optimization
performance.description: Improving performance with lazy loading, asset compression, and basic technical SEO structuring for SPA and PWA applications.

git.title: Version Control and Git Collaboration
git.description: Managing source code with Git, GitHub, and GitFlow, facilitating teamwork, version control, and continuous integration.
